summary: A shy but smitten college boy pursues a NY go-go boy through the pretext of making a documentary film about him, with the guys knowing each other only as "Doc" and "Go."
cast: Tanner Cohen|Matthew Camp|Ramon O. Torres|Judy McLane|Tedd Merrit
keywords: male nudity|male frontal nudity|crush|go go dancer|american flag
title: Getting Go, the Go Doc Project
